name: Cosmic Omen
description: At 6th level, you can consult your Star Map for omens after a long rest. Roll a die to gain a special reaction until your next long rest: Weal (add a d6 to a creature's roll) for even rolls, and Woe (subtract a d6 from a creature's roll) for odd rolls. You can use this reaction a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, regaining all uses after a long rest.
